es.definition: La cualidad de atraer o cautivar a alguien; un hechizo o amuleto.

pt.definition: A qualidade de atrair ou cativar alguém; um feitiço ou amuleto.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

type_word.name: Verb
type_word.description: Words that describe an action or state.

definition: The quality of attracting or captivating someone; a spell or amulet.
examples: Her charm and charisma made her a popular leader.
He gave her a charm bracelet as a gift.
The old book contained a charm to ward off evil spirits.

es.definition: Una representación visual de datos o información; un mapa, diagrama o tabla que muestra datos organizados.

pt.definition: Uma representação visual de dados ou informações; um mapa, diagrama ou tabela que mostra dados organizados.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

type_word.name: Verb
type_word.description: Words that describe an action or state.

definition: A visual representation of data or information; a map, diagram, or table that displays organized data.
examples: The chart shows the growth of the company over the past year.
She used a chart to explain the process to the team.
The weather chart predicts rain for tomorrow.

es.definition: De bajo costo; no caro; que no requiere mucho dinero para comprar o adquirir.

pt.definition: De baixo custo; não caro; que não requer muito dinheiro para comprar ou adquirir.

type_word.name: Adjective
type_word.description: Words that describe or modify nouns.

type_word.name: Adverb
type_word.description: Words that describe or modify verbs, adjectives, or other adverbs.

definition: Low in cost; not expensive; not requiring a lot of money to purchase or acquire.
examples: This restaurant is known for its delicious food at cheap prices.
She found a cheap flight ticket for her vacation.
You can buy cheap clothing at the thrift store.

es.definition: Engañar o desviarse de las reglas, a menudo de manera deshonesta, para obtener una ventaja o resultado favorable en un juego, examen, competencia, etc.

pt.definition: Enganar ou desviar-se das regras, frequentemente de maneira desonesta, para obter uma vantagem ou resultado favorável em um jogo, exame, competição, etc.

type_word.name: Verb
type_word.description: Words that describe an action or state.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

definition: To deceive or deviate from the rules, often dishonestly, to gain an advantage or favorable outcome in a game, exam, competition, etc.
examples: He tried to cheat on the test by looking at someone else's paper.
Cheating in sports can result in disqualification.
She felt guilty after cheating in the game.

es.definition: La parte carnosa y redondeada de la cara, debajo del ojo y al lado de la nariz; una de las dos áreas en la cara donde se sonríe.

pt.definition: A parte carnuda e arredondada do rosto, abaixo do olho e ao lado do nariz; uma das duas áreas no rosto onde se sorri.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

definition: The fleshy, rounded part of the face, below the eye and beside the nose; one of the two areas on the face where a smile appears.
examples: She kissed him on the cheek.
His cheeks turned red with embarrassment.
The baby's chubby cheeks were adorable.

es.definition: Un producto alimenticio sólido hecho generalmente de leche cuajada y a menudo madurado para mejorar su sabor.

pt.definition: Um produto alimentício sólido geralmente feito de coalhada de leite e frequentemente maturado para melhorar seu sabor.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

definition: A solid food product typically made from milk curd and often aged to enhance its flavor.
examples: She loves to put cheese on her pasta.
Cheddar cheese is popular in sandwiches.
The cheese board featured a variety of artisanal cheeses.

es.definition: Una persona profesional que prepara y cocina alimentos, generalmente en un entorno de restaurante o cocina de alta calidad.

pt.definition: Uma pessoa profissional que prepara e cozinha alimentos, geralmente em um ambiente de restaurante ou cozinha de alta qualidade.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

definition: A professional person who prepares and cooks food, typically in a restaurant or high-quality kitchen setting.
examples: The chef at this restaurant is known for his culinary skills.
She aspired to become a chef and open her own restaurant.
The head chef created a special menu for the event.

es.definition: Relativo a la química, la ciencia que estudia las propiedades, composición y transformaciones de la materia.

pt.definition: Relativo à química, a ciência que estuda as propriedades, composição e transformações da matéria.

type_word.name: Adjective
type_word.description: Words that describe or modify nouns.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

definition: Relating to chemistry, the science that studies the properties, composition, and transformations of matter.
examples: The laboratory is equipped with various chemical substances.
Chemical reactions can result in the formation of new compounds.
She has a degree in chemical engineering.

es.definition: La ciencia que se ocupa del estudio de las propiedades, composición y transformaciones de la materia, así como de las energías que acompañan a estos procesos.

pt.definition: A ciência que se ocupa do estudo das propriedades, composição e transformações da matéria, bem como das energias que acompanham esses processos.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

definition: The science that deals with the study of the properties, composition, and transformations of matter, as well as the energies accompanying these processes.
examples: Chemistry is a branch of science that explores the behavior of atoms and molecules.
She's majoring in chemistry at the university.
The field of chemistry has made many advancements in recent years.

es.definition: La parte delantera del cuerpo humano, entre el cuello y el abdomen, que contiene el corazón y los pulmones; el área del cuerpo que se encuentra sobre el pecho.

pt.definition: A parte frontal do corpo humano, entre o pescoço e o abdômen, que contém o coração e os pulmões; a área do corpo que está acima do peito.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

definition: The front part of the human body, between the neck and the abdomen, containing the heart and lungs; the area of the body that is above the stomach.
examples: He placed his hand on his chest to feel his heartbeat.
She had a pain in her chest and went to see a doctor.
The treasure chest was hidden in a secret cave.

es.definition: Una ave domesticada comúnmente criada para carne y huevos, especialmente la especie Gallus gallus domesticus.

pt.definition: Uma ave domesticada comumente criada para carne e ovos, especialmente a espécie Gallus gallus domesticus.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

type_word.name: Adjective
type_word.description: Words that describe or modify nouns.

definition: A domesticated bird commonly raised for meat and eggs, especially the species Gallus gallus domesticus.
examples: We're having fried chicken for dinner tonight.
She keeps chickens in her backyard for fresh eggs.
The restaurant serves a variety of chicken dishes.

es.definition: La persona que está a cargo de un grupo, organización o departamento y tiene autoridad para tomar decisiones y dar órdenes.

pt.definition: A pessoa encarregada de um grupo, organização ou departamento e que tem autoridade para tomar decisões e dar ordens.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

type_word.name: Adjective
type_word.description: Words that describe or modify nouns.

definition: The person who is in charge of a group, organization, or department and has the authority to make decisions and give orders.
examples: The company's chief executive officer is responsible for the overall management.
She's the chief of the police department.
The tribal chief made an important decision.

es.definition: Un ser humano en la etapa de desarrollo infantil, generalmente entre el nacimiento y la adolescencia.

pt.definition: Um ser humano na fase de desenvolvimento infantil, geralmente entre o nascimento e a adolescência.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

definition: A human being in the stage of childhood development, typically between birth and adolescence.
examples: Children need love and care from their parents.
She works with disadvantaged children in her community.
The playground is full of happy children.

es.definition: Una sensación de baja temperatura o la falta de calor.

pt.definition: Uma sensação de baixa temperatura ou a falta de calor.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

type_word.name: Verb
type_word.description: Words that describe an action or state.

definition: A sensation of low temperature or the absence of warmth.
examples: I felt a chill as I walked outside in the winter.
She shivered from the chill in the air.
The chill in the room made me reach for a blanket.

es.definition: Una estructura vertical utilizada para expulsar humo o gases de una estufa, horno o chimenea de una casa.

pt.definition: Uma estrutura vertical usada para expelir fumaça ou gases de um fogão, forno ou lareira de uma casa.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

definition: A vertical structure used to expel smoke or gases from a stove, oven, or house fireplace.
examples: Santa Claus enters through the chimney on Christmas Eve.
The chimney of the old house was covered in soot.
They installed a new chimney for their wood-burning stove.

es.definition: La parte prominente en la parte inferior del rostro, debajo de la boca.

pt.definition: A parte proeminente na parte inferior do rosto, abaixo da boca.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

definition: The prominent part at the bottom of the face, below the mouth.
examples: He had a small dimple in his chin when he smiled.
She rested her chin on her hand while thinking.
The boxer was hit in the chin during the match.

es.definition: Un pequeño trozo de material, generalmente de forma rectangular, que se utiliza para varios fines, como almacenar datos, realizar cálculos o como componente electrónico.

pt.definition: Um pequeno pedaço de material, geralmente em forma retangular, usado para várias finalidades, como armazenar dados, fazer cálculos ou como componente eletrônico.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

type_word.name: Verb
type_word.description: Words that describe an action or state.

definition: A small piece of material, typically rectangular in shape, used for various purposes such as storing data, performing calculations, or as an electronic component.
examples: The computer's processor has a powerful chip.
She placed a chip on her bet in the casino.
The poker player won a pile of chips.

es.definition: Un producto dulce y sabroso hecho con cacao, azúcar y a veces leche, que se derrite fácilmente y se utiliza en postres y dulces.

pt.definition: Um produto doce e saboroso feito com cacau, açúcar e, às vezes, leite, que derrete facilmente e é usado em sobremesas e doces.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

definition: A sweet and flavorful product made from cocoa, sugar, and sometimes milk, which easily melts and is used in desserts and candies.
examples: I love dark chocolate with almonds.
She gave me a box of chocolates for Valentine's Day.
The hot chocolate was perfect on a cold winter day.

es.definition: El acto de seleccionar o elegir entre dos o más opciones o alternativas.

pt.definition: O ato de selecionar ou escolher entre duas ou mais opções ou alternativas.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

definition: The act of selecting or picking between two or more options or alternatives.
examples: You have the choice to accept or decline the job offer.
Her choice of colors for the painting was excellent.
Making the right choice is not always easy.

es.definition: Una sustancia grasa que se encuentra en el cuerpo y en ciertos alimentos, y que puede ser perjudicial en exceso para la salud del corazón.

pt.definition: Uma substância gordurosa encontrada no corpo e em certos alimentos, que pode ser prejudicial em excesso para a saúde do coração.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

definition: A fatty substance found in the body and in certain foods, which can be harmful in excess to heart health.
examples: High cholesterol levels can increase the risk of heart disease.
It's important to monitor your cholesterol intake through your diet.
The doctor recommended medication to lower his cholesterol.

es.definition: Que persiste durante un largo período de tiempo o que es recurrente.

pt.definition: Que persiste por um longo período de tempo ou é recorrente.

type_word.name: Adjective
type_word.description: Words that describe nouns or pronouns.

definition: Persisting for a long period of time or being recurrent.
examples: He suffered from chronic back pain for years.
The country has a chronic shortage of clean drinking water.
Her chronic lateness was a constant source of frustration.

es.definition: Una porción o fragmento de algo grande.

pt.definition: Uma porção ou fragmento de algo grande.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

definition: A portion or fragment of something large.
examples: She cut a chunk of cheese for the party.
He broke off a chunk of the chocolate bar.
The earthquake caused a chunk of the cliff to fall into the ocean.

es.definition: Un edificio utilizado para el culto religioso cristiano, especialmente en la tradición católica o protestante.

pt.definition: Um edifício usado para o culto religioso cristão, especialmente na tradição católica ou protestante.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

definition: A building used for Christian religious worship, especially in the Catholic or Protestant tradition.
examples: They got married in a beautiful old church.
Every Sunday, they attend church services as a family.
The church's steeple is a prominent landmark in the town.

es.definition: Un cilindro de tabaco enrollado en papel fino, que se enciende y se fuma.

pt.definition: Um cilindro de tabaco enrolado em papel fino, que é aceso e fumado.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

definition: A cylindrical roll of tobacco in thin paper, ignited and smoked.
examples: He smoked a cigarette on the balcony.
Cigarette smoking is harmful to your health.
She quit smoking and hasn't had a cigarette in years.

es.definition: Un lugar donde se proyectan películas para el entretenimiento del público.

pt.definition: Um lugar onde filmes são exibidos para o entretenimento do público.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

definition: A place where movies are screened for the entertainment of the public.
examples: Let's go to the cinema to watch the latest blockbuster.
The cinema is showing a classic film festival this weekend.
She works at the local cinema selling tickets and popcorn.

es.definition: Una forma geométrica plana con todos los puntos a la misma distancia del centro.

pt.definition: Uma forma geométrica plana com todos os pontos à mesma distância do centro.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

type_word.name: Verb
type_word.description: Words that describe an action or state.

definition: A flat geometric shape with all points at the same distance from the center.
examples: She drew a perfect circle on the paper.
The children sat in a circle for storytime.
The Earth is roughly shaped like a circle.

es.definition: Un camino cerrado o ruta que normalmente se recorre en una actividad, como una carrera o un circuito eléctrico.

pt.definition: Um caminho fechado ou rota geralmente percorrida em uma atividade, como uma corrida ou um circuito elétrico.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

type_word.name: Verb
type_word.description: Words that describe an action or state.

definition: A closed path or route typically traveled in an activity, such as a race or an electrical circuit.
examples: The Formula 1 cars raced around the circuit at high speeds.
The electric circuit is responsible for powering the entire building.
He completed the circuit of the hiking trail in record time.

es.definition: Un hecho o condición que rodea una situación o evento particular.

pt.definition: Um fato ou condição que cerca uma situação ou evento específico.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

definition: A fact or condition surrounding a particular situation or event.
examples: Due to the circumstances, the event had to be postponed.
In certain circumstances, it's best to remain calm and composed.
The circumstances of his death remain a mystery.

es.definition: Mencionar o referenciar una fuente, texto o autor en un documento o discurso.

pt.definition: Mencionar ou referenciar uma fonte, texto ou autor em um documento ou discurso.

type_word.name: Verb
type_word.description: Words that describe an action or state.

definition: To mention or reference a source, text, or author in a document or speech.
examples: He cited several scientific studies to support his argument.
You should always cite your sources when writing a research paper.
The professor asked the students to cite examples from the textbook.

es.definition: Una persona que es un miembro legal de un país y tiene derechos y responsabilidades civiles.

pt.definition: Uma pessoa que é membro legal de um país e tem direitos e responsabilidades civis.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

definition: A person who is a legal member of a country and has civil rights and responsibilities.
examples: Citizens have the right to vote in democratic elections.
He became a naturalized citizen after years of living in the country.
Good citizens contribute to their communities in positive ways.

es.definition: Un área densamente poblada, generalmente con un gobierno local y servicios públicos, más grande que un pueblo pero más pequeña que una metrópolis.

pt.definition: Uma área densamente povoada, geralmente com um governo local e serviços públicos, maior do que uma vila, mas menor do que uma metrópole.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

definition: A densely populated area, typically with a local government and public services, larger than a town but smaller than a metropolis.
examples: New York City is known as the 'Big Apple.'
The city center is bustling with activity.
Many cities around the world have historic landmarks.

es.definition: Hacer más claro o comprensible, eliminar la confusión o la ambigüedad.

pt.definition: Tornar mais claro ou compreensível, eliminar a confusão ou ambiguidade.

type_word.name: Verb
type_word.description: Words that describe an action or state.

definition: To make something clearer or more understandable, eliminate confusion or ambiguity.
examples: Can you please clarify the instructions for this assignment?
The teacher clarified the concept with a simple explanation.
His explanation did little to clarify the situation.

es.definition: Una colisión violenta o un enfrentamiento brusco entre dos o más objetos o personas.

pt.definition: Uma colisão violenta ou um confronto abrupto entre dois ou mais objetos ou pessoas.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

type_word.name: Verb
type_word.description: Words that describe an action or state.

definition: A violent collision or abrupt confrontation between two or more objects or people.
examples: There was a clash of opinions during the meeting.
The clash between the rival soccer teams was intense.
The clash of thunder and lightning signaled the approaching storm.

es.definition: Un grupo de estudiantes que asisten juntos a una lección o curso de instrucción.

pt.definition: Um grupo de estudantes que assistem juntos a uma lição ou curso de instrução.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

definition: A group of students who attend a lesson or course of instruction together.
examples: The teacher had a class of twenty students.
I have a math class in the morning.
The class listened attentively to the lecture.

es.definition: Algo que es considerado una obra de arte, un estándar de calidad o un ejemplo ejemplar.

pt.definition: Algo que é considerado uma obra de arte, um padrão de qualidade ou um exemplo exemplar.

type_word.name: Adjective
type_word.description: Words that describe nouns.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

definition: Something that is considered a work of art, a standard of quality, or an exemplary example.
examples: The novel is a classic of English literature.
The car is a classic example of vintage design.
Classic films from the 1940s are still popular today.

es.definition: Una habitación en una escuela o institución educativa donde los estudiantes asisten a clases.

pt.definition: Um espaço em uma escola ou instituição educacional onde os alunos frequentam aulas.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

definition: A room in a school or educational institution where students attend classes.
examples: The classroom was filled with eager students.
The teacher wrote on the chalkboard in the classroom.
We had a math test in the classroom today.

es.definition: Eliminar la suciedad, el polvo, las manchas o las impurezas de algo.

pt.definition: Remover sujeira, poeira, manchas ou impurezas de algo.

type_word.name: Verb
type_word.description: Words that describe an action or state.

definition: To remove dirt, dust, stains, or impurities from something.
examples: She used a special cleanser to cleanse her face.
The rain helped cleanse the streets of the city.
It's important to cleanse wounds to prevent infection.

es.definition: Una persona que trabaja en una oficina, tienda u organización, generalmente realizando tareas administrativas o de atención al cliente.

pt.definition: Uma pessoa que trabalha em um escritório, loja ou organização, geralmente desempenhando tarefas administrativas ou de atendimento ao cliente.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

definition: A person who works in an office, store, or organization, typically performing administrative or customer service tasks.
examples: The clerk at the front desk helped me check in.
She's been a loyal clerk at the store for many years.
The court clerk keeps records of legal proceedings.

es.definition: Tener la capacidad de aprender rápidamente y comprender las cosas con facilidad.

pt.definition: Ter a capacidade de aprender rapidamente e compreender as coisas com facilidade.

type_word.name: Adjective
type_word.description: Words that describe nouns.

definition: Having the ability to learn quickly and understand things easily.
examples: She's a clever student who excels in all her classes.
His clever use of technology made the project a success.
The clever detective solved the mystery.

es.definition: Presionar brevemente un botón en un dispositivo, generalmente un ratón o una pantalla táctil, para seleccionar o activar algo.

pt.definition: Pressionar brevemente um botão em um dispositivo, geralmente um mouse ou uma tela sensível ao toque, para selecionar ou ativar algo.

type_word.name: Verb
type_word.description: Words that describe an action or state.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

definition: To briefly press a button on a device, typically a mouse or touchscreen, to select or activate something.
examples: Click the 'OK' button to confirm your selection.
You can click on the links to navigate the website.
I heard a click when I pressed the camera's shutter button.

es.definition: Una persona o entidad que utiliza los servicios o compra productos de una empresa o profesional.

pt.definition: Uma pessoa ou entidade que utiliza os serviços ou compra produtos de uma empresa ou profissional.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

definition: A person or entity that uses the services or purchases products from a business or professional.
examples: The client was satisfied with the quality of the product.
Our company values its clients and strives for excellent customer service.
She's a loyal client of the fitness center.

es.definition: Las condiciones atmosféricas predominantes en un lugar, incluyendo factores como la temperatura, la humedad, el viento y las precipitaciones.

pt.definition: As condições atmosféricas predominantes em um local, incluindo fatores como temperatura, umidade, vento e precipitação.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

definition: The prevailing atmospheric conditions in a place, including factors such as temperature, humidity, wind, and precipitation.
examples: The climate in this region is characterized by hot summers and cold winters.
Climate change is a global concern with far-reaching consequences.
The tropical climate attracts tourists year-round.

es.definition: Un establecimiento de atención médica donde se ofrecen servicios de diagnóstico, tratamiento y atención de pacientes.

pt.definition: Um estabelecimento de atendimento médico onde são oferecidos serviços de diagnóstico, tratamento e atendimento a pacientes.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

definition: A medical care facility where diagnostic, treatment, and patient care services are offered.
examples: She visited the clinic for a routine check-up.
The dental clinic provides services for oral health.
The clinic is known for its compassionate staff.

es.definition: Un dispositivo que mide y muestra la hora.

pt.definition: Um dispositivo que mede e exibe a hora.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

definition: A device that measures and displays the time.
examples: The clock on the wall is ticking loudly.
I need to set my alarm clock for tomorrow morning.
The grandfather clock in the hallway is an antique.

es.definition: Un mueble con puertas y estantes utilizado para guardar ropa, objetos personales u otros artículos.

pt.definition: Um móvel com portas e prateleiras usado para guardar roupas, itens pessoais ou outros objetos.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

definition: A piece of furniture with doors and shelves used to store clothing, personal items, or other articles.
examples: She organized her shoes neatly in the closet.
The walk-in closet has plenty of space for clothes.
He reached into the closet to grab his coat.

es.definition: Un material flexible y tejido hecho de fibras naturales o sintéticas, utilizado para hacer ropa, sábanas, cortinas y otros productos textiles.

pt.definition: Um material flexível e entrelaçado feito de fibras naturais ou sintéticas, usado para fazer roupas, lençóis, cortinas e outros produtos têxteis.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

definition: A flexible, woven material made from natural or synthetic fibers, used to make clothing, sheets, curtains, and other textile products.
examples: She sewed a beautiful dress from a piece of cloth.
The tablecloth was decorated with a floral pattern.
Cotton is a common material for making cloth.

es.definition: Artículos de vestir usados para cubrir el cuerpo, como camisas, pantalones, vestidos y abrigos.

pt.definition: Itens de vestuário usados para cobrir o corpo, como camisas, calças, vestidos e casacos.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

definition: Items of clothing worn to cover the body, such as shirts, pants, dresses, and coats.
examples: She picked out her clothes for the party.
In some cultures, traditional clothes are still worn daily.
His closet was filled with clothes of all colors.

es.definition: Una masa visible de diminutas gotas de agua o cristales de hielo suspendidos en la atmósfera, que forma parte del ciclo del agua y puede producir precipitaciones.

pt.definition: Uma massa visível de minúsculas gotas de água ou cristais de gelo suspensos na atmosfera, que faz parte do ciclo da água e pode causar precipitação.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

definition: A visible mass of tiny water droplets or ice crystals suspended in the atmosphere, part of the water cycle and capable of producing precipitation.
examples: The sky was filled with dark clouds before the storm.
Clouds can take various shapes and sizes.
He looked up and saw a cloud in the shape of a heart.

es.definition: Un grupo de personas que se reúnen regularmente para participar en actividades, intereses o pasatiempos comunes.

pt.definition: Um grupo de pessoas que se reúnem regularmente para participar de atividades, interesses ou hobbies comuns.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

definition: A group of people who regularly gather to participate in common activities, interests, or hobbies.
examples: He's a member of the photography club at his school.
The club organizes hiking trips every month.
She joined the book club to discuss literature.

es.definition: Una pista o indicio que ayuda a resolver un misterio o a entender una situación complicada.

pt.definition: Uma pista ou indício que ajuda a resolver um mistério ou a entender uma situação complicada.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

definition: A hint or indication that helps solve a mystery or understand a complicated situation.
examples: The detective found a clue that led to the identity of the thief.
Her sudden disappearance was a clue that something was wrong.
We need to follow every clue to solve this puzzle.

es.definition: Una colección de elementos similares que están cerca unos de otros o relacionados de alguna manera.

pt.definition: Uma coleção de elementos semelhantes que estão próximos uns dos outros ou relacionados de alguma forma.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

definition: A collection of similar elements that are close to each other or related in some way.
examples: The cluster of stars formed a beautiful constellation.
A cluster of grapes hung from the vine.
She found a cluster of mushrooms in the forest.

es.definition: Una sustancia negra o marrón oscura, generalmente sólida, que se utiliza como fuente de energía y se quema para producir calor o electricidad.

pt.definition: Uma substância negra ou marrom escura, geralmente sólida, usada como fonte de energia e queima-se para produzir calor ou eletricidade.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

definition: A black or dark brown substance, usually solid, used as a source of energy and burned to produce heat or electricity.
examples: Many power plants rely on coal as a fuel source.
Miners extract coal from underground mines.
The coal industry has environmental challenges.

es.definition: La tierra junto al borde del océano, un mar, un lago o un río.

pt.definition: A terra ao longo da borda do oceano, mar, lago ou rio.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

type_word.name: Verb
type_word.description: Words that describe an action or state.

definition: The land along the edge of the ocean, sea, lake, or river.
examples: They went for a walk along the coast at sunset.
The coastal region is known for its beautiful beaches.
The ship approached the coast slowly.

es.definition: Una prenda de vestir que se usa para protegerse del frío, generalmente con mangas y botones o cremallera en la parte delantera.

pt.definition: Uma peça de roupa usada para se proteger do frio, geralmente com mangas e botões ou zíper na parte da frente.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

type_word.name: Verb
type_word.description: Words that describe an action or state.

definition: A piece of clothing worn to protect oneself from the cold, typically with sleeves and buttons or a zipper in the front.
examples: She put on her coat before going outside in the snow.
His coat was made of warm wool.
You should hang your coat on the hook.

es.definition: Una bebida caliente hecha a partir de granos de café tostados y molidos, generalmente servida con o sin leche y azúcar.

pt.definition: Uma bebida quente feita a partir de grãos de café torrados e moídos, geralmente servida com ou sem leite e açúcar.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

definition: A hot beverage made from roasted and ground coffee beans, typically served with or without milk and sugar.
examples: She likes to start her day with a cup of black coffee.
Do you prefer your coffee with cream and sugar?
They sat at the café and enjoyed their coffee.

es.definition: Una pieza de metal o plástico que se utiliza como medio de intercambio y se acuña con un valor específico.

pt.definition: Uma peça de metal ou plástico usada como meio de troca e cunhada com um valor específico.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

type_word.name: Verb
type_word.description: Words that describe an action or state.

definition: A piece of metal or plastic used as a medium of exchange and stamped with a specific value.
examples: He found a rare coin from the 19th century.
I need some change for the parking meter.
Coins are often collected as a hobby.

es.definition: La calidad o estado de estar a una temperatura baja o por debajo de la temperatura corporal normal.

pt.definition: A qualidade ou estado de estar a uma temperatura baixa ou abaixo da temperatura corporal normal.

type_word.name: Adjective
type_word.description: Words that describe or modify nouns and pronouns, giving more information about them.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

definition: The quality or state of being at a low temperature or below normal body temperature.
examples: The weather is very cold today.
She likes to drink cold water in the summer.
I caught a cold from being outside in the rain.

es.definition: Trabajar juntos en un proyecto o tarea, a menudo compartiendo ideas y esfuerzos para lograr un objetivo común.

pt.definition: Trabalhar em conjunto em um projeto ou tarefa, frequentemente compartilhando ideias e esforços para atingir um objetivo comum.

type_word.name: Verb
type_word.description: Words that describe an action or state.

definition: To work together on a project or task, often sharing ideas and efforts to achieve a common goal.
examples: The two companies decided to collaborate on a new product.
Students often collaborate on group projects at school.
Collaborating with experts can lead to innovative solutions.

es.definition: El acto o resultado de colapsar, caerse o romperse repentinamente debido a la presión, el peso o la debilidad.

pt.definition: O ato ou resultado de colapsar, cair ou quebrar repentinamente devido à pressão, peso ou fraqueza.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

type_word.name: Verb
type_word.description: Words that describe an action or state.

definition: The act or result of suddenly falling down, giving way, or breaking down due to pressure, weight, or weakness.
examples: The collapse of the building was a tragic event.
The stock market experienced a sudden collapse.
Her health took a sudden collapse.

es.definition: Una banda o correa que se usa alrededor del cuello, generalmente para sujetar una prenda de vestir o como adorno.

pt.definition: Uma faixa ou tira usada ao redor do pescoço, geralmente para prender uma peça de roupa ou como adorno.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

type_word.name: Verb
type_word.description: Words that describe an action or state.

definition: A band or strap worn around the neck, usually to fasten a garment or as an ornament.
examples: She wore a beautiful pearl collar with her dress.
The dog's collar had its name tag attached.
He adjusted his collar before going on stage.

es.definition: Una persona con la que se trabaja o estudia en el mismo lugar o en la misma organización.

pt.definition: Uma pessoa com quem se trabalha ou estuda no mesmo local ou na mesma organização.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

definition: A person with whom one works or studies in the same place or organization.
examples: She's my colleague at the office.
I have many colleagues in my department.
We often have lunch together as colleagues.

es.definition: Una institución educativa, generalmente de nivel superior a la escuela secundaria, donde se ofrecen cursos y programas de estudio.

pt.definition: Uma instituição de ensino, geralmente de nível superior ao ensino médio, onde são oferecidos cursos e programas de estudo.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

definition: An educational institution, typically higher in level than a high school, where courses and study programs are offered.
examples: I'm attending college to pursue a degree in biology.
He graduated from a prestigious college.
College life can be both challenging and rewarding.

es.definition: Un impacto violento entre dos o más objetos en movimiento que chocan entre sí.

pt.definition: Um impacto violento entre dois ou mais objetos em movimento que se chocam.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

definition: A violent impact between two or more moving objects that collide with each other.
examples: The collision between the two cars resulted in significant damage.
The collision of the ships was a major maritime accident.
Physics studies the principles of collision and motion.

es.definition: Una parte del intestino grueso que tiene funciones importantes en la absorción de agua y minerales, y en la formación de heces.

pt.definition: Uma parte do intestino grosso que desempenha funções importantes na absorção de água e minerais e na formação de fezes.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

definition: A part of the large intestine that has important functions in water and mineral absorption and in the formation of feces.
examples: The colon plays a crucial role in digestion.
Colon cancer is a serious health condition.
A healthy diet is essential for a well-functioning colon.

es.definition: Un grupo de personas que se establecen en un área y forman una comunidad, a menudo en un lugar nuevo o lejano.

pt.definition: Um grupo de pessoas que se estabelecem em uma área e formam uma comunidade, frequentemente em um local novo ou distante.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

definition: A group of people who settle in an area and form a community, often in a new or distant place.
examples: The Pilgrims established the first English colony in America.
Many European countries had overseas colonies in the past.
The ant colony was highly organized and efficient.

es.definition: Una estructura vertical que soporta peso o carga, como la de un edificio o una columna vertebral.

pt.definition: Uma estrutura vertical que suporta peso ou carga, como a de um prédio ou uma coluna vertebral.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

definition: A vertical structure that supports weight or load, such as that of a building or a spinal column.
examples: The columns of the ancient temple were decorated with intricate carvings.
A healthy spine has a straight and well-aligned column of vertebrae.
The newspaper has a regular column on technology.

es.definition: La acción de luchar o enfrentar a un oponente o enemigo, a menudo en un conflicto militar o deportivo.

pt.definition: A ação de lutar ou enfrentar um oponente ou inimigo, frequentemente em um conflito militar ou esportivo.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

type_word.name: Verb
type_word.description: Words that describe an action or state of being.

definition: The action of fighting or confronting an opponent or enemy, often in a military or sporting conflict.
examples: The soldiers were in combat for several hours.
Boxing is a sport that involves physical combat in the ring.
The combat against disease requires medical research and treatments.

es.definition: Unir o mezclar cosas o elementos de manera que funcionen bien juntos o formen una nueva entidad.

pt.definition: Unir ou misturar coisas ou elementos de modo que funcionem bem juntos ou formem uma nova entidade.

type_word.name: Verb
type_word.description: Words that describe an action or state of being.

definition: To unite or mix things or elements in a way that they work well together or form a new entity.
examples: Let's combine the ingredients to make a delicious soup.
The two companies decided to combine their resources and expertise.
Her artistic skills and technical knowledge combine perfectly in her work.

es.definition: Una forma de entretenimiento que se caracteriza por su tono humorístico y la representación de situaciones cómicas.

pt.definition: Uma forma de entretenimento caracterizada por seu tom humorístico e representação de situações cômicas.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

definition: A form of entertainment characterized by its humorous tone and portrayal of comic situations.
examples: I love watching stand-up comedy shows.
The comedy film had the audience laughing from start to finish.
Comedy can be a great way to relieve stress and have a good time.

es.definition: La sensación de bienestar y comodidad física o mental.

pt.definition: A sensação de bem-estar e comodidade física ou mental.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

type_word.name: Verb
type_word.description: Words that describe an action or state of being.

definition: The feeling of physical or mental well-being and comfort.
examples: This cozy chair provides great comfort while reading.
After a long day at work, she sought comfort in her favorite book.
Comfort can be found in spending time with loved ones.

es.definition: Un libro o revista que contiene una serie de viñetas o ilustraciones que cuentan una historia o presentan situaciones humorísticas.

pt.definition: Um livro ou revista que contém uma série de quadrinhos ou ilustrações que contam uma história ou apresentam situações humorísticas.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

type_word.name: Adjective
type_word.description: Words that describe or modify nouns.

definition: A book or magazine that contains a series of comic strips or illustrations telling a story or presenting humorous situations.
examples: I enjoy reading comic books in my free time.
The comic strip in the newspaper always makes me laugh.
Comic conventions are popular events for fans of graphic novels.

es.definition: Una expresión verbal o escrita que expresa una opinión, juicio o respuesta a algo.

pt.definition: Uma expressão verbal ou escrita que expressa uma opinião, julgamento ou resposta a algo.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

type_word.name: Verb
type_word.description: Words that describe an action or state of being.

definition: A verbal or written expression that conveys an opinion, judgment, or response to something.
examples: I appreciate your thoughtful comments on the matter.
She left a comment on the blog post to share her thoughts.
Please provide any comments or suggestions for improvement.

es.definition: La actividad de comprar y vender bienes y servicios, especialmente en el ámbito económico.

pt.definition: A atividade de comprar e vender bens e serviços, especialmente no âmbito econômico.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

definition: The activity of buying and selling goods and services, especially in the economic sphere.
examples: E-commerce has grown significantly in recent years with online shopping.
International commerce involves trade between countries.
The Chamber of Commerce supports local businesses.

es.definition: Un grupo de personas designadas para llevar a cabo una tarea o investigar un asunto específico.

pt.definition: Um grupo de pessoas designadas para realizar uma tarefa ou investigar um assunto específico.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

type_word.name: Verb
type_word.description: Words that describe an action or state of being.

definition: A group of people designated to carry out a task or investigate a specific matter.
examples: The commission was formed to study the impact of climate change.
She received a commission to create a custom artwork.
The government appointed a commission to investigate corruption allegations.

es.definition: Hacer un compromiso formal o promesa de hacer algo.

pt.definition: Fazer um compromisso formal ou promessa de fazer algo.

type_word.name: Verb
type_word.description: Words that describe an action or state of being.

definition: To make a formal commitment or promise to do something.
examples: She decided to commit to a healthier lifestyle by exercising regularly.
When you commit to a project, it's important to follow through.
The company will commit to reducing its carbon footprint.

es.definition: Una promesa o acuerdo formal de hacer algo o seguir una determinada acción o política.

pt.definition: Uma promessa ou acordo formal de fazer algo ou seguir uma determinada ação ou política.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

definition: A formal promise or agreement to do something or adhere to a particular course of action or policy.
examples: His commitment to the project was unwavering.
The company's commitment to sustainability is evident in its practices.
Marriage is a lifelong commitment to each other.

es.definition: Un grupo de personas designadas para llevar a cabo una tarea específica o tomar decisiones en nombre de una organización o entidad.

pt.definition: Um grupo de pessoas designado para realizar uma tarefa específica ou tomar decisões em nome de uma organização ou entidade.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

definition: A group of people designated to carry out a specific task or make decisions on behalf of an organization or entity.
examples: The committee was responsible for reviewing the proposed changes.
The school's committee meets regularly to discuss curriculum improvements.
The committee members were selected for their expertise.

es.definition: Una organización comercial o industrial que se dedica a actividades comerciales o productivas con el fin de generar ganancias.

pt.definition: Uma organização comercial ou industrial que se dedica a atividades comerciais ou produtivas com o objetivo de gerar lucro.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

definition: A commercial or industrial organization engaged in commercial or productive activities with the aim of generating profits.
examples: The company specializes in software development.
She works for a multinational company.
Starting a company requires careful planning and resources.

es.definition: La preocupación y empatía hacia el sufrimiento de los demás, acompañada a menudo por un deseo de ayudar o aliviar ese sufrimiento.

pt.definition: A preocupação e empatia pelo sofrimento dos outros, muitas vezes acompanhadas pelo desejo de ajudar ou aliviar esse sofrimento.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

definition: Concern and empathy for the suffering of others, often accompanied by a desire to help or alleviate that suffering.
examples: Her compassion for the homeless led her to volunteer at a shelter.
Compassion is a fundamental value in many religious teachings.
Showing compassion towards others can create a more compassionate society.

es.definition: Forzar o persuadir a alguien a hacer algo mediante la fuerza, la presión o la autoridad.

pt.definition: Forçar ou persuadir alguém a fazer algo por meio de força, pressão ou autoridade.

type_word.name: Verb
type_word.description: Words that describe an action or state of being.

definition: To force or persuade someone to do something through force, pressure, or authority.
examples: The evidence was compelling enough to convince the jury of his guilt.
She felt compelled to speak out against the injustice.
The law can compel individuals to testify in court.

es.definition: La acción o proceso de competir en una actividad o evento para lograr un objetivo o ganar un premio.

pt.definition: A ação ou processo de competir em uma atividade ou evento para atingir um objetivo ou ganhar um prêmio.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

definition: The action or process of competing in an activity or event to achieve a goal or win a prize.
examples: The competition for the championship title was fierce.
Participating in a competition can be a rewarding experience.
Businesses often face intense competition in the market.

es.definition: Una expresión de insatisfacción, descontento o disgusto con algo o alguien.

pt.definition: Uma expressão de insatisfação, descontentamento ou desagrado com algo ou alguém.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

definition: An expression of dissatisfaction, discontent, or displeasure with something or someone.
examples: He filed a formal complaint with the company regarding their product.
Her complaint about the noise was addressed by the building management.
Customer complaints can provide valuable feedback for improvement.

es.definition: Hacer que algo sea más difícil o confuso al agregar complejidad o problemas.

pt.definition: Tornar algo mais difícil ou confuso, adicionando complexidade ou problemas.

type_word.name: Verb
type_word.description: Words that describe an action or state of being.

definition: To make something more difficult or confusing by adding complexity or problems.
examples: The unexpected delay will complicate our travel plans.
Attempting to complicate the issue only leads to confusion.
The decision to involve more parties may complicate the negotiation process.

es.definition: Crear o formar algo al combinar o poner juntos sus elementos o partes.

pt.definition: Criar ou formar algo ao combinar ou juntar seus elementos ou partes.

type_word.name: Verb
type_word.description: Words that describe an action or state of being.

definition: To create or form something by combining or putting together its elements or parts.
examples: The artist will compose a new piece of music for the concert.
She has the ability to compose beautiful poems.
The team will compose a report summarizing their findings.

es.definition: La acción o proceso de crear o formar algo al combinar o poner juntos sus elementos o partes.

pt.definition: A ação ou processo de criar ou formar algo ao combinar ou juntar seus elementos ou partes.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

definition: The action or process of creating or forming something by combining or putting together its elements or parts.
examples: The composition of the painting is both striking and beautiful.
The composition of the committee reflects a diverse range of expertise.
The composition of the soil affects plant growth.

es.definition: Incluyendo o abarcando todos los elementos o aspectos relevantes; completo y amplio en alcance o alcance.

pt.definition: Incluindo ou abrangendo todos os elementos ou aspectos relevantes; completo e amplo em escopo ou alcance.

type_word.name: Adjective
type_word.description: Words that describe or modify nouns.

definition: Including or encompassing all relevant elements or aspects; complete and wide in scope or range.
examples: The comprehensive report covered every aspect of the project.
The school offers a comprehensive education program.
Their comprehensive approach to healthcare addresses various needs.

es.definition: Reducir el tamaño o el volumen de algo al aplicar presión o fuerza sobre ello.

pt.definition: Reduzir o tamanho ou o volume de algo ao aplicar pressão ou força sobre ele.

type_word.name: Verb
type_word.description: Words that describe an action or state of being.

definition: To reduce the size or volume of something by applying pressure or force to it.
examples: You can compress the files to save disk space.
The athlete used a bandage to compress the swelling in his leg.
The hydraulic press is used to compress metal into sheets.

es.definition: Incluir o consistir en; tener como parte o componente.

pt.definition: Incluir ou consistir em; ter como parte ou componente.

type_word.name: Verb
type_word.description: Words that describe an action or state of being.

definition: To include or consist of; to have as part or component.
examples: The committee will comprise experts from various fields.
The team is comprised of talented individuals.
The book comprises three different stories.

es.definition: Llegar a un acuerdo en el que ambas partes aceptan hacer concesiones para resolver un conflicto o problema.

pt.definition: Chegar a um acordo em que ambas as partes concordam em fazer concessões para resolver um conflito ou problema.

type_word.name: Noun & Verb
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena and describe an action or state of being.

definition: To reach an agreement in which both parties agree to make concessions to resolve a conflict or problem.
examples: They compromised on the terms of the contract.
Compromising can lead to mutually beneficial solutions.
In a healthy relationship, both partners are willing to compromise.

es.definition: Realizar cálculos matemáticos o computacionales.

pt.definition: Realizar cálculos matemáticos ou computacionais.

type_word.name: Verb
type_word.description: Words that describe an action or state of being.

definition: To perform mathematical or computational calculations.
examples: The computer can quickly compute complex equations.
Engineers compute the structural integrity of bridges.
Scientists use algorithms to compute data.

es.definition: Una máquina electrónica que procesa datos y realiza cálculos de manera automática y programada.

pt.definition: Uma máquina eletrônica que processa dados e realiza cálculos de forma automática e programada.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

definition: An electronic machine that processes data and performs calculations automatically and programmatically.
examples: I use my computer for work and entertainment.
Computers have revolutionized various industries.
A computer consists of hardware and software components.
